item.title: The Goat Life / Aadujeevitham
item.description: Rating: This is my first movie review. After watching this film, I felt compelled to share my thoughts. This cinema surpasses the standards of not only Malayalam but Indian cinema as well. The film Aadujeevitham is based on a novel of the same name by author Benyamin. The story is inspired by a true incident from the life of a man named Najeeb, who hails from a small village in Kerala, India.
